tool_description: Official cryptocurrency market API provides a comprehensive list of coins, profiles, stats, trends, most watch, top gainers/losers, newly created, and more! This API is ideal for web and APP developers.
name: Cryptocurrency Markets
title: Cryptocurrency Markets

api_list.name: v1/modules
api_list.description: This endpoint can provide the following data: global metric, crypto videos, trends, most visited coins, newly launched, top gainers, and top losers.

required_parameters.name: module
required_parameters.description:
Select from the following list:
**global_matric:** Global Metric data.
**videos:** Recent Crypto Videos.
**trending:** Top Trending cryptocurrencies.
**most_visited:** Cryptocurrency with the most page visits.
**new_coins:** Newly launched cryptocurrencies.
**gainer:** Top cryptocurrency gainers.
**loser:** Top cryptocurrency losers.

api_list.name: v1/coins
api_list.description: All active cryptocurrencies available to trade
